name: Zupass Builders: Presentations and Office Hours
description:
Zupass contributors will host a discussion session on ideas for Zuzalu infrastructure and for the ZK Hack Weekend. Builders are invited to share ideas, ask questions, make feature requests, and more!

We'll have Zupass contributors and third-party devs give a few short demos and presentations starting at 2:15PM. Community members are invited to pitch and share ideas during this session as well.
